api-error-messages.bad-request-error: The information input is not in the correct format.
api-error-messages.internal-server-error: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
api-error-messages.login-unauthorized-error: Wrong email address, username and/or password.

form.mandatory-fields: Fields marked with '<abbr title="mandatory" class="mandatory-mark">'*'</abbr>' are mandatory

competences.informations: Your certified score was calculated based on your answers during the certification process. It can therefore differ from the number of Pix displayed in your profile. On the day of your certification it was possible to reach level 5 skills and 640 pix maximum.
competences.subtitle: (level on 5)
competences.title: Certified skills

certification-start.title: Join a certification session
certification-start.access-code: Enter the access code communicated by the supervisor

contact.info: In accordance with the  IT and freedom law, you can exercise your right of access to data concerning you and have them rectified by sending an email to

cgu.info: By clicking on " Start my test ", I accept that my identity data, the certification number and the circumstances of the test as informed by the supervisor are communicated to Pix. Pix will use them during the jury's deliberation to produce and archive my results and to edit my certificate. If this certification has been prescribed by an organization, I accept that Pix will communicate my results to it.

certification-start.first-title: You will start your certification test

skip-error-message.qcm: Choose at least one answer to validate. Skip otherwise.
skip-error-message.qcu: Choose an answer to validate. Skip otherwise.
skip-error-message.qroc: Play the challenge to validate. Skip otherwise.
skip-error-message.qrocm: Fill in all the answer fields to validate. Skip otherwise.

modal.warning: Please note: if you have an evaluation course in progress, some questions may be asked.

subtitle.text: Don't have a Pix account yet?

sign-up.title: Sign up

cgu.error: Please accept terms of service before you sign up
cgu.label: ''*'' I accept ''Pix's CGU''

password.error: Password should have 8 characters, one uppercase and lowercase letter and one number at least.
password.help: (8 char min, with uppercase, lowercase and a number)
password.label: Password

sign-up.instructions: Fields marked with '<abbr title="mandatory" class="mandatory-mark">'*'</abbr>' are mandatory
sign-up.legal-information: By signing in, you allow Pix to store your data. They will be kept for a maximum of 5 years, starting with your last sign in date, and will then be archived according to statutory limitation periods (5 years). They are only used by Pix and Pix's service providers. In accordance to the law « informatique et libertés », you can exercise your right of access to data and correct them by sending an email to dpd@pix.fr.
